name: Malta's Adventure
description:
PROTOTYPE 0.01 (02/24/2022)

You're Malta, a young woman burning with a sense of justice. When evil threatens your village, it's up to you to deliver justice to the evil fiends.

A work in progress~

This is a free game.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS (PROTOTYPE)

Windows 7 or higher

DirectX 9 (Installer comes with web installer for it)

2gb RAM

Dual Core CPU

13mb free space

REQUIREMENTS ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys - Menu Selections and Move Malta

Escape - Open Subscreen

Z and X - On Subscreen, equip items to use. In game, use items

Spacebar - Make Menu Selections, open doors, and chests

Some menu options do not work, or are not finished yet.

Rooms reset upon reentry. Prototype was designed so that it's not an issue. Finished game will have persistence

Six different items are available to use

A sword, shield (not fully functioning), a crossbow, bombs, a magic rod, and a magic gauntlet.

Bombs can blow up some walls and saw blades. Be careful, they damage you a lot!

Coins can be spent on things, when I add some things.

Fruit recovers your Power Gauge. Touching traps and enemies reduces it. When it reaches zero, the game ends.

Four enemy types!

Bombs and arrows can be replenished by finding drops.

Some doors are locked, find keys to open them. Keys show up on the subscreen.

The magic rod and magic glove have a recharge time. The gloves can push round pillars and break rocks. It can hurt some enemies too. The rod shoots fire.

Prototype features a 15 room dungeon. Find the crystal at the end.

Made with Gamemaker Studio 1, Professional Edition

CHANGELOG

0.01 (02/24/2022): Initial prototype release.

One of my life's dreams is to make an amazing game. This is the beginning of that story.

PROTOTYPE: ALL CONTENT SUBJECT TO CHANGE. GAMEPLAY AND SCREENS NOT FINAL

Please try my game and let me know what you think. Thanks a bunch!
